Articles.Content: Hey guys. I've been following KSP since its young days. I've never been particularly good at anything, but I've logged quite a few hours and had my fair share of those special moments that KSP is chock-full of. I've managed to dock in Kerbin orbit, and I just completed my first Mun landing (though it was rough). Now that I've got a firm grasp of the basics, I want to pursue more ambitious goals. What better place to start than the forums? So hello, greetings, salutations, and I'm glad to be joining this great community. Good luck on all of your endeavors!
